1353450.name: VoltHaven
1353450.description:
VoltHaven is real-time management simulation of electric grid.

You start from scratch in village without energy infrastructure.

Build various power sources and utility buildings as backbone of your grid. Connect first customers and earn money to expand. Advance from makeshift or cheap & obsolete technology to modern power plants, to be able to connect more customers or cut running costs. You can also engage in growing crops or mining resources to up your cash flow.

And while doing this, try to maintain reliable electricity flow with minimal power outages.

Features

  • energy generation types like Thermal, Wind, Solar, Nuclear, Hydro

  • electricity sources ranging from small kilowatt generators to high megawatt power plants

  • your customers will be individual households, small businesses and large factories

  • commodities (like Diesel, Coal or Wood) are used mainly for fuel, but you can also produce and trade them

  • adapt to local and seasonal weather changes

  • sandbox is default play mode, tutorial and challenge missions are available

  • underlying simulation model with real-time calculation of power flow in grid structures

  • uses individual customer's time-based energy profiles

  • renewable power relays on wind speed, sun elevation or temperature, with intraday and seasonal variances

  • weather and economy parameters are based on present European data

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
